cards: The group decides a category, you have 30s to name as many thing as possible
All the players must mix their drinks into one, thats your drink!
You must sip your drink for 10s
Everyone starts drinking; you can only stop when the person to your left does!
For the next round you must drink when anyone else does
Have a sip of your drink
Take a shot then spin round 15 times
Use your non dominant hand to hold your drink for the next round
Take a sip from every players drink
The group chooses your next drink
Speak in a different accent for the next round, if you mess up - drink!
You and another player both chug your drinks. Whever finished last does the winners next forfeit
